meanings.sent1: Jees! I can't believe I forgot my lunch.
meanings.sent2: Oh jees, I missed the bus again.
meanings.sent3: Jees, I dropped my sandwich on the floor!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me shout 'jees!' in surprise.
meanings.sent5: As the magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, the audience gasped, 'jees!'

meanings.definition: Used to express mild annoyance or exasperation.
meanings.sent1: Jees, why is the Wi-Fi so slow today?
meanings.sent2: Hey, jees, can you stop tapping your pencil?
meanings.sent3: Jees, I can't find my keys anywhere!
meanings.sent4: The constant noise from the construction site made her mutter 'jees' under her breath.
meanings.sent5: The never-ending line at the grocery store made everyone in line sigh 'jees' in frustration.
